svg.aria-label: Genome assembly with HiFi reads and trio phasing VGP5 workflow diagram
svg.title: Genome Assembly with HiFi + Trio Phasing VGP5
svg.desc: VGP workflow for genome assembly using PacBio HiFi reads with parental Illumina data for trio-based haplotype phasing via Hifiasm, with BUSCO/Compleasm and Merqury quality assessment
svg.text: Genome Assembly with HiFi + Trio Phasing VGP5
